Clinopyroxene data from Lucey, JGR-E, E1, 1703-1714, 1998
To calculate the real index, use equation 8a of Lucey 1998
n_cpx = 1.726 - [0.0082 * Mg number]

To calculate the imaginary index use the columns below
Fits only valid for 0.65 < Mg number < 0.95

k_cpx(lambda) =col 2 + [Mg number * col 3]

col 1 = wavelength, in micrometers
col 1		col 2		col 3
